name: inconceivable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 impossible to imagine or think of: inconceivable to The idea that they might not win was inconceivable to them. It would be inconceivable for her to change her mind. He added that it was unconceivable to him that anyone would consent to such a change.
Thesaurus: synonyms, antonyms, and examples
not able to happen, exist, or be trueimpossibleYou can't be at my party and at work at the same time – it's impossible!be out of the questionGoing on holiday under these circumstances is out of the question.no wayThere is absolutely no way your mother will allow that.inconceivableIt's inconceivable that the president didn't know about the military attack.unthinkableA wide-scale nuclear attack is unthinkable.
See more results »
extremely unlikely: virtually/almost inconceivable Another nuclear accident in the same place is virtually/almost inconceivable.it is inconceivable that It is not inconceivable (= it is possible) that she could be lying.
